function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Significant decline in sales and workforce layoffs in the restaurant and food services industry due to COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Financial instability, increased unemployment, and economic disruption","Mitigation":"Implementing alternative business models, such as curbside pickup and delivery, and adapting operating hours and service practices","Technologies":"Online ordering and delivery platforms, contactless payment systems, and digital marketing tools","People":"Restaurant operators, food service workers, and consumers","Owner":"Restaurant operators, industry associations, and government"}]}
